body.name: Crayan Full Mattress, 12 Inch Memory Foam Mattress Full Size, Hybrid Mattress in a Box with Pocket Spring for Motion Isolation, Quiet Sleep, CertiPUR-US
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 49 mins
features: 【CertiPUR US & Oeko-Tex Certified】Crayan 12 inch full mattresses is certified by CertiPUR US and Oeko-Tex Standard 100, no harmful substances, so our memory foam mattress full is safe for all people, including pregnant and kids, you can sleep on this foam mattress full with confidence.

【Pressure-Free Comfort】The Individual pocket spring coils are perfectly coordinated with the comfort foam to ensure your weight is evenly absorbed and distributed throughout the full size mattress from head to toe and relieve pressure points, you can let go of your day's fatigue and sleep comfortably with any sleeping positions.

【Quiet and Hassle-Free Sleep】Our full mattress is supported by hundreds of individual pocket springs and the spring is wrapped in non-woven fabric individually, which can block the effect from your partner’s movement and ensure your sleeping quality, makes you sleep through the night without disturbance.

【Mattress in a Box】Crayan full size mattress is compressed and smartly packed in a box, so it can be transported to your room easily, even for one person. Remove mattress from packaging, allow 48-72 hours for decompression and dissipate the odor, no installation needed. This mattress can be used with a box spring, slatted frame, platform bed or metal grid.

【Worry-free Purchase】Crayan mattresses come with a 100-night trial and 10-year support. The foam of our bed mattress meets CertiPUR-US standards, you can enjoy a safe and sound sleep with confidence. If you are not satisfied for any reason, please feel free to contact us, our dedicated support team is ready to help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a new mattress, and I couldn't be happier with my choice. The comfort level is outstanding, providing the perfect balance of support and softness. I wake up feeling refreshed and free of any aches or pains. The quality of sleep I've experienced has noticeably improved, making it a worthwhile investment in my overall well-being. The durable construction and attention to detail in design also contribute to the mattress's overall appeal. I highly recommend it to anyone in search of a restful and rejuvenating night's sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable and Firm. Especially for low price and convenience with shipping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid medium plush mattress
reviews.reviewText: This mattress sprang to life upon opening it! The fabric is soft, the top is plush, and there is a nice balance of spring and cushion. I like that there aren't weird designs stitched on the top that can make strange sinkholes when laying down. I bought it for my daughter and I think it will last her years to come. It's also comfortable enough for me in the event I'm called in when she can't sleep. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I haven't had it long and I have a suspicion the plush top will flatten easily and make the springs feel more noticeable. Something about it doesn't seem solid/thick enough to maintain good padding. For the price, it was definitely worth it though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A ticket to a better night sleep
reviews.reviewText: Never bought a boxed mattress before, seeing the positive reviews for this product made me buy it. We allowed the mattress to puff out to 24 hours before laying on it, but you can wait for the recommended 72 hours. First night sleeping on it, no body pain! It’s not as fluffy as I thought it would be as advertised “plush”, it’s definitely firm but I believe breaking it in after months of sleep it might get fluffier. Definitely worth the price!Delivery-Make sure you or someone is able to be home during delivery for this item, Amazon sends you a password to give to the delivery person. I didn’t see this mentioned in the reviews. Thought it would be good to let some know!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was a little nervous ordering a mattress without trying it first, but it is SO comfortable. It's just firm enough to support my joints, but it's cozy and soft right where I need it. I can lay in any position and feel supported and comfortable.It's pretty heavy, so you might need help if you're a smaller build. The little slicer they provide is a joke, so I just used a box cutter (slowly and carefully so I didn't cut the mattress). Make sure you open it at the end so the air rushes out and lets the mattress expand while you remove the rest of the plastic.It says to let it sit for 24-72 hours. Mine was almost fully expanded after several hours, but I let it sit for 48 hours. I slept on it that night, and it was fine. I didn't notice any off-gassing, even though it's winter here and my windows are shut. There wasn't any odor at all, which was nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We got a new bed and chose this mattress to go with it. Easy to get out of the box and to get into the bed. We did let it sit for the recommended 72 hours and it is so comfortable! No box spring needed, queen size sheets fit perfect, and it looks great! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort for less
reviews.reviewText: This mattress is very comfortable at an affordable price. Easy set up and rose to the stated height. I bought a 10inch mattress. Within 24 hours I measured the mattress height in which it was 10inches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The mattress arrived in excellent condition and I unboxed it the next day. I got the full size and it's kinda heavy, about 50 pounds I think, but it wasn't that hard to get out of the box or get on the bed frame. The little letter opener type tool is a joke. I used my scissors, just be careful not to cut your mattress. There's 2 layers of plastic, one keeps it rolled and the other keeps it sealed. Once on the frame and the plastic removed it started to expand right away but it only got to 8 inches. I let it sit for the recommended 3 days but it never got to 10 as in their description, the reason for the 4 stars. As with any new mattress it may take first few nights to get used to, my back hurt a little at first. The mattress is bouncy so no motion isolation like the ad says, and the edges are a little flimsey, it almost feels like I'm sliding off when I go to get up, but it's comfy and I sleep well. They offer a 100 night trial and I would send it back and get a true memory foam but how the heck would I get it back in the box. If you don't like bouncy, don't get this mattress but it IS soft and comfy.

I ordered this mattress for my daughter’s room. It is so comfortable! We have only had it about a month so I cannot yet speak to durability. It does not feel like a cheap mattress. I’ll never buy another expensive box store mattress. I’d order it again.
Purchased this mattress for our guest room. It’s very well made and very comfortable. It’s reasonably priced and I would recommend this product to anyone.

This mattress arrived quickly and was very easy to unwrap with the helpful tool provided. It is very comfortable and I am extremely happy with this purchase. I would definitely recommend this mattress.

The Crayan mattress arrived in excellent condition, re-inflating to its full size nicely. It looked just like the ad, and we loved the medium firmness. Yes, the edges are a bit softer, which means you sink if you sit just on the very edge, but that's no problem. Comfortable and a great deal.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great product at a great price
reviews.reviewText: The mattress is super comfortable and exactly as described. The shipping was quick and the box it shipped in was super easy to carry.
